title: >>> PAINBALL Punishment?
body_text:
It's the January finale and with all the buzz and commotion on next week's Toms River Tournament, players are anxious to get on the court and prove they have what it takes to stand tall and proud come February 3.
DODGEBALL 74: January 27, 2007
What could possibly happen that hasn't happened already? Last week was a brutally cold event, and judging by this past week's weather, it wouldn't come as a surprise if the below-freezing temperatures continued. Will dodgeball witness its very first "Snow War"? It's been something many can honestly say they've been looking forward too.
In regards to the upcoming tournament, DODGEBALL 74 is the final stop on "The Road to Dover". Several participants are pulling for an all-painball event, obviously in order to practice for the take over of Dover. Will a majority speak up and out in favor of such an idea? The world will have to wait and see.
This is truly going to be a wild event regardless of what happens.
-- Again, DODGEBALL 75 will happen in two weeks time, February 10. It is heavily rumored that
Chris Adams vs. Kevin Fitzpatrick
will headline this spectacular event. There long-awaited rematch may have a little twist however.
-- Next week, the TRT takes center stage headined by 20 of the most legendary figures to ever set foot on the dodgeball playing grounds. The abridged story of the events leading up the TRT will be posted by midweek, so stayed tuned right here to
dodgeball.livejournal.com
.
body_html:
It's the January finale and with all the buzz and commotion on next week's Toms River Tournament, players are anxious to get on the court and prove they have what it takes to stand tall and proud come February 3.

DODGEBALL 74: January 27, 2007
What could possibly happen that hasn't happened already? Last week was a brutally cold event, and judging by this past week's weather, it wouldn't come as a surprise if the below-freezing temperatures continued. Will dodgeball witness its very first "Snow War"? It's been something many can honestly say they've been looking forward too.

In regards to the upcoming tournament, DODGEBALL 74 is the final stop on "The Road to Dover". Several participants are pulling for an all-painball event, obviously in order to practice for the take over of Dover. Will a majority speak up and out in favor of such an idea? The world will have to wait and see.

This is truly going to be a wild event regardless of what happens.

-- Again, DODGEBALL 75 will happen in two weeks time, February 10. It is heavily rumored that Chris Adams vs. Kevin Fitzpatrick will headline this spectacular event. There long-awaited rematch may have a little twist however.

-- Next week, the TRT takes center stage headined by 20 of the most legendary figures to ever set foot on the dodgeball playing grounds. The abridged story of the events leading up the TRT will be posted by midweek, so stayed tuned right here to dodgeball.livejournal.com.
